Module count
Package count.matek

Class ShiftedGeometric

java.lang.Object
count.matek.ShiftedGeometric
All Implemented Interfaces:
DiscreteDistribution
public class ShiftedGeometric
extends Object
implements DiscreteDistribution
Shifted geometric distribution. Specifically, the point mass function [pi] is defined as follows. p0=p; p1=(1-p)(1-q); pk=(1-p)(1-q)qk-1.
Since:
March 20, 2008, 10:59 AM
Author:
Miklós Csűrös

  • Method Details

    • getPointMassFunction

      public double[] getPointMassFunction​(int n)
      Computes point mass function [pi] for a shifted geometric distribution. Reminder: pk=(1-p)(1-q)qk-1.
      Specified by:
      getPointMassFunction in interface DiscreteDistribution
      Parameters:
      n - limit on how far the probabilities are computed
      Returns:
      [p0 p1 ... pn]
